text: as we merged convergence to master there was a chaincode API change, and all the tutorials are outdated now - I just realized

<@U1AU8DRQR>  - the trick here is how we can document and support the v0.6 release as well as people who will start to use the v1.0 stuff (master).  I think this is both a doc issue as well as dealing with the chaincode interface (  :disappointed:  )
as for the doc part: we could have a 0.6 and a 1.0 doc everywhere, or not?
We should be able to modify our readthedoc to support a version structure
(other projects do it so certainly we can figure it out  )
